title: UK says Western allies have already pledged $35bn for Ukraine this year
summary_full: Ukraine’s Western allies have already pledged around $35 billion in military aid to Kyiv this year, British defence minister John Healey said Thursday. The figure includes new commitments by individual countries, but also previous promises made by Ukraine’s allies, including the 11.5 billion euros ($13.6 billion) already announced by Germany, a diplomat at NATO said. […]
